categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens

nodes.text: Star Wars: Droid Factory is a Studio Fun International title within the Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens initiative. It comprises 32 pages was released on November 3, 2015.
Become a Star Wars droid expert and build your own BB-8, R2-D2, and C-3PO that can be fitted to wheels to roll along!

Packed with facts about all types of droids from the Star Wars universe, this book also includes press-out pieces and stickers to make mini-model droids of BB-8, R2-D2, C-3PO, and more! You can then mount the droid onto a wind-up base that will have your droid moving along!
